lyrics.stanza: Revive Thy work, dear Lord! Thy mighty arm make bare; Move in the hearts and wake the souls, And make Thy presence dear.
Revive Thy work, dear Lord! And manifest Thy power; O come upon Thy church as in The Pentecostal hour.
Revive Thy work, dear Lord! Disturb this sleep of death; Quicken the smouldering embers now By Thine almighty breath.
Revive Thy work, dear Lord! Create soul-thirst for Thee; And hungering for the Bread of Life, O may our spirits be!
Revive Thy work, dear Lord! And give abounding joy; O fill our hearts with perfect love, And burn out all alloy!
Revive Thy work, dear Lord! Repeat Thy deeds of grace; Thy mighty name be magnified, To Thee be all the praise.
